overview: I didn’t realize how much you mean to me until you were gone. Everything reminds me of you. I am lost without you. I can only be whole again once you are back with me. Without the guide of her “lost love”, Thuy is on the verge of death by boredom. Aimless and indecisive. Having no agenda, she finds odd ways to entertain herself in the bustling city of Saigon, Vietnam.
title: Sigh Gone
